name: Pink Onion
author: Amy W.
description:
My new favorite casual place, I only wish it was closer to home.

We were going to a show at Slim's and this popped up on Yelp.

It was Tuesday at 5:45 and we got right in. It is a small room, with tables and a bar.

The bartender came right over with menus an a sample of vermouth (crazy right?) he said he gets it from their wine distributer - it kinda tasted like Pimms.

We ordered a few things to split. 
-The burrata and prosciutto salad with arugula and roasted pears.
-The meatballs - AMAZING, they had pine nuts in them and the nice heavy grind of the meat was incredible
-The pesto pasta with pistachios

The warm bread they make every hour - comes with a very peppery olive oil.

We also got a 1/2 carafe of pinot noir.

Our bill was $71 before tax or tip, we were stuffed. Before we left they brought over 2 glasses of port.

Can't wait to come back! (and try the pizza)
